desc: Toronto Based Company. Chloe Bakeware carries variety of quality made in Korea products for all your baking needs. Korean style Bread & Cake pans, Mousse rings, and Moulds etc. Patented Silicone Coated Baking Pans make baking a lot more enjoyable. Cake boxes and boards are also available for home & commercials.

layout.text: We Offer Free, Same-Day Pick Up Service! Contactless Pick Up Also Available!
